Hi 

Can anybody guide me about how to test the JavaMail in Junit. 

I tried the dumstar a dummy SMTP server and mstor but still I am not able test my JavaMail code. 

I am operation on STORE and FOLDER 

e.g. calling methods as in my code as follows.

Store m_store;

m_store.coonect(mailhost,mailuser,password);

to test in junit I want that when above method gets called it should reurn a connection which will be refering to some of my local store. 

Please suggest some way.. 

Thanks in adavance.

Saroj
